---
name: UI/UX Issue
about: Report design inconsistencies or behavior problems in SwiftUI screens
title: "[UI/UX] - "
labels: ui-ux
assignees: ""
---

## Describe the Issue
What is wrong with the UI/UX?  
Examples:
- Misaligned SwiftUI components
- Incorrect paddings, spacings, or SafeArea handling
- Wrong colors or typography
- NavigationBar or sheet presentation issues
- Accessibility problems (VoiceOver, contrast, labels)

## Screenshots / Recordings
Attach screenshots or screen recordings showing the issue.

## Expected Behavior
Describe how the screen should look or behave:
- Expected layout
- Correct spacing or hierarchy
- Proper interaction or gesture behavior
- Correct animation performance

## Environment
- Device: (e.g., iPhone 14, iPhone SE 2020)
- iOS Version: (e.g., iOS 17.5)
- App Version / Commit: (e.g., v1.0.0, abc123)
- Build: Debug / Release

## Suggestions
(Optional) Ideas for improving the UI/UX:  
- Proposed layout adjustments  
- Better SwiftUI component usage  
- Accessibility improvements  
- Visual refinements (spacing, alignment, styling)
